Mr. James Miles
November 12, 195>2
Page 2
if Monday and Tuesday November 2Uth and 2£th might not be our best
bet. Please check the availability of space for approximately five
people at the Illini Union on those dates and give me a reply con¬
cerning your and Frank's availability on those two dates. We smuLd
also want Dallas Smythe to be in on a portion of this meeting.
Another matter of special concern right away is getting
resolutions out. May I propose that I draft in rather careful
detail all of the resolutions which need to be mailed, send out
those which are routing, and forward the others to you for revision
and copying in some elaborate style as was proposed at the conven¬
tion. O.K.? There are many other matters which I should like
your reaction to, but these are of sufficient urgency that I shall
get this off to you and wait until a later date for the others.
My warmest regards always.
Gray donrAusmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA(FM)

cc: Frank Schooley
P.S. Please forward me some of our new stationery<
